definition: an obstruction that stands in the way and must be removed, surmounted or circumvented
details:
noun
- an obstruction that stands in the way and must be removed, surmounted or circumvented
= example: an obstruction that stands in the way and must be removed, surmounted or circumvented
- something immaterial that stands in the way and must be circumvented or surmounted
= example: something immaterial that stands in the way and must be circumvented or surmounted
= synonyms: obstruction
